combine.description: Generate intermediate json file by combining the documentation file and the discovered services.

docsUrl.name: docsUrl
docsUrl.description: The url of the documentation, this is just to override the documentation url

docsFile.name: docsFile
docsFile.description: File location of documenation, instead of url.

models.name: models
models.description: Models to use, separated by comma. as {model}-{softwareGen}

folder.name: folder
folder.description: Load discovered services from this folder. Loaded from repository if empty

discoveryUrl.name: discoveryUrl
discoveryUrl.description: Base url to load the discovery files from

generate.description: Generate files based on the intermediate file and a template.

intermediate.name: intermediate
intermediate.description: intermediate file to use. generate with 'combine'

args.name: template
args.description: The template to use, either a folder relative to the current or a folder an included in the generator

args.name: output
args.description: The root directory where the files should be generated

services.description: Fetch device discovery document and generate json file
